byline.contributor: Reporting was contributed by Al Baker, Matt Flegenheimer, Joseph Goldstein, Rob Harris, Colin Moynihan, Andy Newman, Patrick McGeehan and Patrick Wall.

snippet: A single-engine helicopter, with five people onboard, went down moments after it took off from a helipad at East 34th Street, the authorities said.
lead_paragraph: A single-engine helicopter, with five people onboard, went down moments after it took off from a helipad at East 34th Street, the authorities said.

headline.main: Helicopter Plunges Into East River, Killing a Passenger; 4 People Survive
headline.print_headline: Helicopter Plunges Into East River, Killing a Passenger; 4 People Survive
headline.seo: Helicopter Crashes in East River, Killing Passenger
